trans-unit.source: A python workflows library that supports writing Processes with a well defined set of inputs and outputs that can be strung together.
trans-unit.target: A python workflows library that supports writing Processes with a well defined set of inputs and outputs that can be strung together.

trans-unit.source: Optional explicit specification of inputs and outputs including their types, validation functions, help strings, etc.
trans-unit.target: Optional explicit specification of inputs and outputs including their types, validation functions, help strings, etc.

trans-unit.source: Processes can be remotely controlled by sending messages over RabbitMQ all from a simple interface
trans-unit.target: Processes can be remotely controlled by sending messages over RabbitMQ all from a simple interface

trans-unit.source: Progress can be saved between steps and continued later
trans-unit.target: Progress can be saved between steps and continued later

trans-unit.source: RabbitMQ is used to queue up, control and monitor running processes via the kiwipy library.
trans-unit.target: RabbitMQ is used to queue up, control and monitor running processes via the kiwipy library.
